<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_631216_yunit_yunit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Yunit Resolue le </name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// Instantiate the NeedItUtils class.  Call the isDatePast method and pass 
	// the u_when_needed value.
	var niutils = new Resolule();
	var isPast = niutils.isDatePast(current.u_glide_date_time_6);
	
	// If the isDatePast method returns true, the date is in the past.
	if(isPast == true){
		gs.addErrorMessage("Erreur lors de l'enregistrement");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-13 13:20:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f6b962942f7c3010773e2b5df699b64c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Yunit Resolue le </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Yunit" source="x_631216_yunit">6117b1442f303010773e2b5df699b69a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Yunit">6117b1442f303010773e2b5df699b69a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f6b962942f7c3010773e2b5df699b64c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-13 13:33:03</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f6b962942f7c3010773e2b5df699b64c"/></record_update>
